ygData.subject: new player on Bertoxx
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello! I had been looking for a G/L/B/T posting site for EverQuest and finally found you all today.  Hurray! I am on the Bertoxx server and have 16th cleric
ygData.messageBody:
Hello!
I had been looking for a G/L/B/T posting site for EverQuest and
finally found you all today. Hurray!

I am on the Bertoxx server and have 16th cleric Cryzstal, 9th
paladin Pyotr, and 8th druid Leatherboy. (Leatherboy's original name
was gayboy but I thought that was a little too 'in-your-face'.)

I have another friend who I group with late night who is gay and
would love to meet or hear from other people.

Thanks for your replies!

Scott aka Pyotr
